items.name: Unicorn Racing Extravaganza
items.description: Race majestic unicorns through enchanted forests and mystical meadows in this whimsical racing game!

items.name: Zombie Dance Party
items.description: Join the undead on the dance floor for a groovy night of brain-munching beats and monster moves!

items.name: Banana Peel Bonanza
items.description: Slip, slide, and hurl bananas at your opponents in this wacky multiplayer mayhem!

items.name: Penguin Plumber Panic
items.description: Help penguins fix leaky pipes and navigate treacherous waters in this icy adventure!

items.name: Squirrel Simulator 3000
items.description: Experience life as a furry woodland creature as you scurry, stash, and steal your way through the forest!

items.name: Kitty Cat Chaos
items.description: Embrace your inner feline as you embark on a mischievous journey through a world ruled by cats!

items.name: Superhero Chicken Squad
items.description: Join a team of heroic chickens as they peck, scratch, and cluck their way to justice!

items.name: Robot Roller Derby Rumble
items.description: Customize your mechanical derby bot and roll, dash, and slam your way to victory in this futuristic sport!

items.name: Alien Disco Invasion
items.description: Beam aboard the mothership for an out-of-this-world dance party with extraterrestrial beats and neon lights!

items.name: Pirate Penguin Plunder
items.description: Hoist the sails and join a crew of penguin pirates as they search for buried fish and buried treasure!

items.name: Ninja Noodle Nonsense
items.description: Slice, dice, and slurp your way through a deliciously chaotic world of flying noodles and ninja antics!

items.name: Space Sloth Saga
items.description: Embark on a slow-motion adventure through the cosmos as a laid-back sloth on a quest for cosmic enlightenment!

items.name: Vampire Vacation
items.description: Sink your fangs into a bloody good time as you navigate a world of sun, sand, and supernatural romance!

items.name: Monster Munchies Mayhem
items.description: Join a hungry horde of monsters as they chomp, chew, and gobble their way through a city-sized buffet!

items.name: Funky Frog Frenzy
items.description: Hop, leap, and ribbit your way through a swampy wonderland of funky beats and amphibious adventure!
